title: sa_jayadeva-gītagovinda
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<note>TEXT IN PAUSA</note>

<lg xml:id='GG_1.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.1-1'>meghaiḥ meduram ambaram vana-bhuvaḥ śyāmāḥ tamāla-drumaiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.1-2'>naktam bhīruḥ ayam tvam eva tat imam rādhe gṛham prāpaya /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.1-3'>ittham nanda-nideśataḥ calitayoḥ prati-adhva-kuñja-drumam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.1-4'>rādhā-mādhavayoḥ jayanti yamunā-kūle rahaḥ-kelayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.2-1'>vāk-devatā-carita-citrita-citta-sadmā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.2-2'>padmāvatī-caraṇa-cāraṇa-cakravartī</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.2-3'>śrī-vāsudeva-rati-keli-kathā-sametam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.2-4'>etam karoti jayadeva-kaviḥ prabandham //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.3-1'>vācaḥ pallavayati umāpatidharaḥ saṃdarbha-śuddhim girām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.3-2'>jānīte jayadevaḥ eva śaraṇaḥ ślāghyaḥ durūha-drute /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.3-3'>śṛṅgāra-uttara-sat-prameya-racanaiḥ ācāryagovardhana-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.3-4'>spardhī kaḥ api na viśrutaḥ śrutidharaḥ dhoyī kavi-kṣmāpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.4-1'>yadi hari-smaraṇe sarasam manaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.4-2'>yadi vilāsa-kalāsu kutūhalam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.4-3'>madhura-komala-kānta-pada-āvalīm</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.4-4'>śṛṇu tadā jayadeva-sarasvatīm //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.5-1'>pralaya-payodhi-jale dhṛtavān asi vedam/</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.5-2'>vihita-vahitra-caritram akhedam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.5-3'>keśava dhṛta-mīna-śarīra</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.5-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.6-1'>kṣitiḥ ativipulatare tava tiṣṭhati pṛṣṭhe /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.6-2'>dharaṇi-dharaṇa-kiṇa-cakra-gariṣṭhe //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.6-3'>keśava dhṛta-kacchapa-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.6-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.7-1'>vasati daśana-śikhare dharaṇī tava lagnā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.7-2'>śaśini kalaṅka-kalā iva nimagnā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.7-3'>keśava dhṛta-śūkara-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.7-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.8-1'>tava kara-kamala-vare nakham adbhuta-śṛṅgam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.8-2'>dalita-hiraṇyakaśipu-tanu-bhṛṅgam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.8-3'>keśava dhṛta-narahari-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.8-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.9-1'>chalayasi vikramaṇe balim adbhuta-vāmana /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.9-2'>pada-nakha-nīra-janita-jana-pāvana //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.9-3'>keśava dhṛta-vāmana-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.9-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.10-1'>kṣatriya-rudhira-maye jagat apagata-pāpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.10-2'>snapayasi payasi śamita-bhava-tāpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.10-3'>keśava dhṛta-bhṛgupati-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.10-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.11-1'>vitarasi dikṣu raṇe dikpati-kamanīyam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.11-2'>daśamukha-mauli-balim ramaṇīyam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.11-3'>keśava dhṛta-rāma-śarīra</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.11-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.12-1'>vahasi vapuṣi viśade vasanam jalada-ābham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.12-2'>hala-hati-bhīti-milita-yamunā-ābham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.12-3'>keśava dhṛta-haladhara-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.12-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.13-1'>nindasi yajña-vidheḥ ahaha śruti-jātam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.13-2'>sadaya-hṛdaya darśita-paśu-ghātam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.13-3'>keśava dhṛta-buddha-śarīra</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.13-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.14-1'>mleccha-nivaha-nidhane kalayasi karavālam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.14-2'>dhūma-ketum iva kim api karālam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.14-3'>keśava dhṛta-kalki-śarīra</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.14-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.15-1'>śrījayadeva-kaveḥ idam uditam udāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.15-2'>śṛṇu sukhadam śubhadam bhava-sāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.15-3'>keśava dhṛta-daśa-vidha-rūpa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.15-4'>jaya jagadīśa hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.16-1'>vedān uddharate jagat nivahate bhūgolam udbibhrate</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.16-2'>daityam dārayate balim chalayate kṣatra-kṣayam kurvate /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.16-3'>paulastyam jayate halam kalayate kāruṇyam ātanvate</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.16-4'>mlecchān mūrcchayate daśa-ākṛti-kṛte kṛṣṇāya tubhyam namaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.17-1'>śrita-kamalā-kuca-maṇḍala dhṛta-kuṇḍala e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.17-2'>kalita-lalita-vana-māla jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.18-1'>dina-maṇi-maṇḍala-maṇḍana bhava-khaṇḍana e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.18-2'>muni-jana-mānasa-haṃsa jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.19-1'>kāliya-viṣa-dhara-gañjana jana-rañjana e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.19-2'>yadu-kula-nalina-dineśa jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.20'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.20-1'>madhu-mura-naraka-vināśana garuḍa-āsana e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.20-2'>sura-kula-keli-nidāna jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.21'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.21-1'>amala-kamala-dala-locana bhava-mocana e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.21-2'>tribhuvana-bhavana-nidhāna jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.22'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.22-1'>janaka-sutā-kṛta-bhūṣaṇa jita-dūṣaṇa e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.22-2'>samara-śamita-daśakaṇṭha jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.23'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.23-1'>abhinava-jaladhara-sundara dhṛta-mandara e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.23-2'>śrī-mukha-candra-cakora jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.24'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.24-1'>śrījayadeva-kaveḥ idam kurute mudam e /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.24-2'>maṅgalam ujjvala-gītam jaya jayadeva hare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.25'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.25-1'>padmā-payodhara-taṭī-parirambha-lagna-kāśmīra-mudritam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.25-2'>uraḥ madhusūdanasya /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.25-3'>vyakta-anurāgam iva khelat-anaṅga-kheda-sveda-ambu-pūram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.25-4'>anupūrayatu priyam vaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.26'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.26-1'>vasante vāsantī-kusuma-sukumāraiḥ avayavaiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.26-2'>bhramantīm kāntāre bahu-vihita-kṛṣṇa-anusaraṇām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.26-3'>amandam kandarpa-jvara-janita-cintā-ākulatayā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.26-4'>valat-bādhām rādhām sarasam idam ūce sahacarī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.27'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.27-1'>lalita-lavaṅga-latā-pariśīlana-komala-malaya-samīre /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.27-2'>madhukara-nikara-karambita-kokila-kūjita-kuñja-kuṭīre //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.27-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.27-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.28'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.28-1'>unmada-madana-manoratha-pathika-vadhū-jana-janita-vilāpe /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.28-2'>ali-kula-saṃkula-kusuma-samūha-nirākula-bakula-kalāpe //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.28-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.28-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.29'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.29-1'>mṛgamada-saurabha-rabhasa-vaśaṃvada-nava-dala-māla-tamāle /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.29-2'>yuva-jana-hṛdaya-vidāraṇa-manasija-nakha-ruci-kiṃśuka-jāle //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.29-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.29-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.30'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.30-1'>madana-mahīpati-kanaka-daṇḍa-ruci-keśara-kusuma-vikāse /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.30-2'>milita-śilīmukha-pāṭali-paṭala-kṛta-smara-tūṇa-vilāse //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.30-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.30-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.31'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.31-1'>vigalita-lajjita-jagat-avalokana-taruṇa-karuṇa-kṛta-hāse /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.31-2'>virahi-nikṛntana-kunta-mukha-ākṛti-ketaka-danturita-āśe //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.31-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.31-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.32'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.32-1'>mādhavikā-parimala-lalite navamālika-jāti-sugandhau /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.32-2'>muni-manasām api mohana-kāriṇi taruṇa-akāraṇa-bandhau //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.32-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.32-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.33'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.33-1'>sphurat-atimukta-latā-parirambhaṇa-mukulita-pulakita-cūte /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.33-2'>vṛndāvana-vipine parisara-parigata-yamunā-jala-pūte //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.33-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.33-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.34'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.34-1'>śrījayadeva--bhaṇitam idam udayati hari-caraṇa-smṛti-sāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.34-2'>sarasa-vasanta-samaya-vana-varṇanam anugata-madana-vikāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.34-3'>viharati hariḥ iha sarasa-vasante</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.34-4'>nṛtyati yuvati-janena samam sakhi virahi-janasya durante //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.35'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.35-1'>dara-vidalita-mallī-valli-cañcat-parāga-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.35-2'>prakaṭita-paṭa-vāsaiḥ vāsayan kānanāni /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.35-3'>iha hi dahati cetaḥ ketakī-gandha-bandhuḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.35-4'>prasarat-asamabāṇa-prāṇavat-gandhavāhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.36'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.36-1'>unmīlat-madhu-gandha-lubdha-madhupa-vyādhūta-cūta-aṅkura-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.36-2'>krīḍat-kokila-kākalī-kalakalaiḥ udgīrṇa-karṇa-jvarāḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.36-3'>nīyante pathikaiḥ katham katham api dhyāna-avadhāna-kṣaṇa-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.36-4'>prāpta-prāṇa-samā-samāgama-rasa-ullāsaiḥ amī vāsarāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.37'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.37-1'>aneka-nārī-parirambha-sambhrama-sphurat-manohāri-vilāsa-lālasam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.37-2'>murārim ārāt upadarśayantī asau sakhī samakṣam punaḥ āha rādhikām //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.38'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.38-1'>candana-carcita-nīla-kalevara-pīta-vasana-vanamālī /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.38-2'>keli-calat-maṇi-kuṇḍala-maṇḍita-gaṇḍa-yuga-smita-śālī //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.38-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.39'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.39-1'>pīna-payodhara-bhāreṇa harim parirabhya sarāgam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.39-2'>gopa-vadhūḥ anugāyati kācit udañcita-pañcama-rāgam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.39-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.40'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.40-1'>kāpi vilāsa-vilola-vilocana-khelana-janita-manojam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.40-2'>dhyāyati mugdha-vadhūḥ adhikam madhu-sūdana-vadana-sarojam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.40-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.41'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.41-1'>kāpi kapola-tale militā lapitum kimapi śruti-mūle /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.41-2'>cāru cucumba nitambavatī dayitam pulakaiḥ anukūle //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.41-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.42'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.42-1'>keli-kalā-kutukena ca kācit amum yamunā-jala-kūle /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.42-2'>mañjula-vañjula-kuñja-gatam vicakarṣa kareṇa dukūle //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.42-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.43'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.43-1'>kara-tala-tāla-tarala-valaya-āvali-kalita-kala-svana-vaṃśe /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.43-2'>rāsa-rase saha-nṛtya-parā hariṇā yuvatiḥ praśaśaṃse //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.43-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.44'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.44-1'>śliṣyati kāmapi cumbati kāmapi kāmapi ramayati rāmām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.44-2'>paśyati sasmita-cāru-parām aparām anugacchati vāmām //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.44-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.45'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.45-1'>śrījayadeva-kaveḥ idam adbhuta-keśava-keli-rahasyam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.45-2'>vṛndāvana-vipine lalitam vitanotu śubhāni yaśasyam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.45-3'>hariḥ iha mugdha-vadhū-nikare vilāsini vilasati kelipare //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.46'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.46-1'>viśveṣām anurañjanena janayan ānandam indīvara-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.46-2'>śreṇī-śyāmala-komalaiḥ upanayan aṅôaiḥ anaṅga-utsavam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.46-3'>svacchandam vraja-sundarībhiḥ abhitaḥ prati-aṅgam āliṅgitaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.46-4'>śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi mūrtimān iva madhau mugdhaḥ hariḥ krīḍati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_1.47'>
<l xml:id='GG_1.47-1'>adya utsaṅga-vasat-bhujaṅga-kavala-kleśāt iva īśa-acalam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.47-2'>prāleya-plavana-icchayā anusarati śrīkhaṇḍa-śaila-anilaḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.47-3'>kim ca snigdha-rasāla-mauli-mukulāni ālokya harṣa-udayāt</l>
<l xml:id='GG_1.47-4'>unmīlanti kuhūḥ kuhūḥ iti kala-uttālāḥ pikānām giraḥ //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_2.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.1-1'>viharati vane rādhā sādhāraṇa-praṇaye harau</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.1-2'>vigalita-nija-utkarṣāt īrṣyā-vaśena gatā anyataḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.1-3'>kvacit api latā-kuñje guñjat-madhuvrata-maṇḍalī-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.1-4'>mukhara-śikhare līnā dīnā api uvāca rahaḥ sakhīm //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.2-1'>saṃcarat-adhara-sudhā-madhura-dhvani-mukharita-mohana-vaṃśam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.2-2'>calita-dṛk-añcala-cañcala-mauli-kapola-vilola-vataṃsam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.2-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.3-1'>candraka-cāru-mayūra-śikhaṇḍaka-maṇḍala-valayita-keśam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.3-2'>pracura-purandara-dhanuḥ-anurañjita-medura-mudira-suveśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.3-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.4-1'>gopa-kadamba-nitambavatī-mukha-cumbana-lambhita-lobham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.4-2'>bandhujīva-madhura-adhara-pallavam ullasita-smita-śobham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.4-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.5-1'>vipula-pulaka-bhuja-pallava-valayita-ballava-yuvati-sahasram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.5-2'>kara-caraṇa-urasi maṇi-gaṇa-bhūṣaṇa-kiraṇa-vibhinna-tamisram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.5-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.6-1'>jalada-paṭala-valat-indu-vinindaka-candana-tilaka-lalāṭam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.6-2'>pīna-ghana-stana-maṇḍala-mardana-nirdaya-hṛdaya-kapāṭam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.6-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.7-1'>maṇi-maya-makara-manohara-kuṇḍala-maṇḍita-gaṇḍam udāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.7-2'>pīta-vasanam anugata-muni-manuja-sura-asura-vara-parivāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.7-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.8-1'>viśada-kadamba-tale militam kali-kaluṣa-bhayaṃ śamayantam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.8-2'>mām api kimapi taraṅgat-anaṅga-dṛśā manasā ramayantam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.8-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.9-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam atisundara-mohana-madhuripu-rūpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.9-2'>hari-caraṇa-smaraṇam prati saṃprati puṇyavatām anurūpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.9-3'>rāse harim iha vihita-vilāsam smarati manaḥ mama kṛta-parihāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.10-1'>gaṇayati guṇa-grāmam bhāmam bhramāt api na īhate</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.10-2'>vahati ca parītoṣam doṣam vimuñcati dūrataḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.10-3'>yuvatiṣu valat-tṛṣṇe kṛṣṇe vihāriṇi mām vinā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.10-4'>punaḥ api manaḥ vāmam kāmam karoti karomi kim //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.11-1'>nibhṛta-nikuñja-gṛham gatayā niśi rahasi nilīya vasantam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.11-2'>cakita-vilokita-sakala-diśā rati-rabhasa-rasena hasantam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.11-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.11-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.12-1'>prathama-samāgama-lajjitayā paṭu-cāṭu-śataiḥ anukūlam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.12-2'>mṛdu-madhura-smita-bhāṣitayā śithilī-kṛta-jaghana-dukūlam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.12-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.12-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.13-1'>kisalaya-śayana-niveśitayā ciram urasi mama eva śayānam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.13-2'>kṛta-parirambhaṇa-cumbanayā parirabhya kṛta-adhara-pānam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.13-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.13-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.14-1'>alasa-nimīlita-locanayā pulaka-āvali-lalita-kapolam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.14-2'>śrama-jala-sakala-kalevarayā vara-madana-madāt atilolam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.14-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.14-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.15-1'>kokila-kala-rava-kūjitayā jita-manasija-tantra-vicāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.15-2'>ślatha-kusuma-ākula-kuntalayā nakha-likhita-ghana-stana-bhāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.15-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.15-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.16-1'>caraṇa-raṇita-maṇi-nūpurayā paripūrita-surata-vitānam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.16-2'>mukhara-viśṛṅkhala-mekhalayā sa-kacagraha-cumbana-dānam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.16-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.16-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.17-1'>rati-sukha-samaya-rasa-ālasayā dara-mukulita-nayana-sarojam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.17-2'>niḥsaha-nipatita-tanu-latayā madhusūdanam udita-manojam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.17-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.17-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.18-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam idam atiśaya-madhuripu-nidhuvana-śīlam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.18-2'>sukham utkaṇṭhita-gopa-vadhū-kathitam vitanotu salīlam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.18-3'>sakhi he keśimathanam udāram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.18-4'>ramaya mayā saha madana-manoratha-bhāvitayā savikāram //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.19-1'>hasta-srasta-vilāsa-vaṃśam anṛju-bhrū-vallimat ballavī-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.19-2'>vṛnda-utsāri-dṛk-anta-vīkṣitam atisveda-ārdra-gaṇḍa-sthalam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.19-3'>mām udvīkṣya vilakṣitam smita-sudhā-mugdha-ānanam kānane</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.19-4'>govindam vraja-sundarī-gaṇa-vṛtam paśyāmi hṛṣyāmi ca //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_2.20'>
<l xml:id='GG_2.20-1'>durāloka-stoka-stabaka-navaka-aśoka-latikā-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.20-2'>vikāsaḥ kāsāra-upavana-pavanaḥ'pi vyathayati /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.20-3'>api bhrāmyat-bhṛṅgī-raṇita-ramaṇīyā na mukula-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_2.20-4'>prasūtiḥ cūtānām sakhi śikhariṇī iyam sukhayati //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_3.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.1-1'>kaṃsāriḥ api saṃsāra-vāsanā-bandha-śṛṅkhalām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.1-2'>rādhām ādhāya hṛdaye tatyāja vraja-sundarīḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.2-1'>itaḥ tataḥ tām anusṛtya rādhikām anaṅga-bāṇa-vraṇa-khinna-mānasaḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.2-2'>kṛta-ānutāpaḥ sa kalinda-nandinī-taṭa-anta-kuñje viṣasāda mādhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.3-1'>mām iyam calitā vilokya vṛtam vadhū-nicayena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.3-2'>sa-aparādhatayā mām api na vārita-atibhayena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.3-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.4-1'>kim kariṣyati kim vadiṣyati sā ciram viraheṇa /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.4-2'>kim dhanena janena kim mama jīvitena gṛheṇa //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.4-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.5-1'>cintayāmi tat-ānanam kuṭila-bhru kopa-bhareṇa /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.5-2'>śoṇa-padmam iva upari bhramatā ākulam bhramareṇa //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.5-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.6-1'>tām aham hṛdi saṃgatām aniśam bhṛśam ramayāmi /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.6-2'>kim vane anusarāmi tām iha kim vṛthā vilapāmi //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.6-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.7-1'>tanvi khinnam asūyayā hṛdayam tava ākalayāmi /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.7-2'>tat na vedmi kutaḥ gatā asi na tena te anunayāmi //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.7-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.8-1'>dṛśyase purataḥ gata-āgatam eva me vidadhāsi /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.8-2'>kim purā iva sasaṃbhramaṃ parirambhaṇam na dadāsi //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.8-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.9-1'>kṣamyatām aparam kadāpi tava īdṛśam na karomi /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.9-2'>dehi sundari darśanam mama manmathena dunomi //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.9-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.10-1'>varṇitam jayadevakena hareḥ idam pravaṇena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.10-2'>kindubilva-samudra-sambhava-rohiṇī-ramaṇena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.10-3'>harihari hata-ādaratayā gatā sā kupitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.11-1'>hṛdi bisa-latā-hāraḥ na ayam bhujaṅgama-nāyakaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.11-2'>kuvalaya-dala-śreṇī kaṇṭhe na sā garala-dyutiḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.11-3'>malayaja-rajaḥ na idam bhasma prihāra-hite mayi</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.11-4'>prahara na hara-bhrāntyā anaṅga krudhā kim u dhāvasi //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.12-1'>pāṇau mā kuru cūta-sāyakam amum mā cāpam āropaya</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.12-2'>krīḍā-nirjita-viśva mūrcchita-jana-āghātena kim pauruṣam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.12-3'>tasyāḥ eva mṛgī-dṛśaḥ manasija-preṅkhat-kaṭākṣa-āśuga-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.12-4'>śreṇī-jarjaritam manāk api manaḥ na adya api saṃdhukṣate //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.13-1'>bhrū-cāpe nihitaḥ kaṭākṣa-viśikhaḥ nirmātu marma-vyathām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.13-2'>śyāma-ātmā kuṭilaḥ karotu kabarī-bhāraḥ api māra-udyamam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.13-3'>moham tāvat ayam ca tanvi tanutām bimba-adharaḥ rāgavān</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.13-4'>sat-vṛtta-stana-maṇḍalaḥ tava katham prāṇaiḥ mama krīḍati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.14-1'>tāni sparśa-sukhāni te ca taralāḥ snigdhāḥ dṛśoḥ vibhramāḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.14-2'>tat-vaktra-ambuja-saurabham saḥ ca sudhā-syandī girām vakrimā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.14-3'>sā bimba-adhara-mādhurī iti viṣaya-āsaṅge api cet mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.14-4'>tasyām lagna-samādhi hanta viraha-vyādhiḥ katham vardhate //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_3.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_3.15-1'>bhrū-pallavam dhanuḥ apāṅga-taraṅgitāni</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.15-2'>bāṇāḥ guṇaḥ śravaṇa-pāliḥ iti smareṇa /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.15-3'>tasyām anaṅga-jaya-jaṅgama-devatāyām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_3.15-4'>astrāṇi nirjita-jaganti kim arpitāni //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_4.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.1-1'>yamunā-tīra-vānīra-nikuñje mandam-āsthitam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.1-2'>prāha prema-bhara-udbhrāntam mādhavam rādhikā-sakhī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.2-1'>nindati candanam indukaraṇam anu vindati khedam adhīram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.2-2'>vyāla-nilaya-milanena garalam iva kalayati malaya-samīram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.2-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.2-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.3-1'>avirala-nipatita-madana-śarāt iva bhavat-avanāya viśālam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.3-2'>sva-hṛdaya-marmaṇi varma karoti sajala-nalinī-dala-jālam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.3-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.3-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.4-1'>kusuma-viśikha-śara-talpam analpa-vilāsa-kalā-kamanīyam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.4-2'>vratam iva tava parirambha-sukhāya karoti kusuma-śayanīyam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.4-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.4-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.5-1'>vahati ca galita-vilocana-jala-bharam ānana-kamalam udāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.5-2'>vidhum iva vikaṭa-vidhuntuda-danta-dalana-galita-amṛta-dhāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.5-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.5-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.6-1'>vilikhati rahasi kuraṅga-madena bhavantam asamaśara-bhūtam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.6-2'>praṇamati makaram adhaḥ vinidhāya kare ca śaram nava-cūtam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.6-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.6-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.7-1'>prati-padam idam api nigadati mādhava tava caraṇe patitā aham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.7-2'>tvayi vimukhe mayi sapadi sudhā-nidhiḥ api tanute tanu-dāham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.7-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.7-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.8-1'>dhyāna-layena puraḥ parikalpya bhavantam atīva durāpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.8-2'>vilapati hasati viṣīdati roditi cañcati muñcati tāpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.8-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.8-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.9-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam idam adhikam yadi manasā naṭanīyam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.9-2'>hari-viraha-ākula-ballava-yuvati-sakhī-vacanam paṭhanīyam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.9-3'>sā virahe tava dīnā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.9-4'>mādhava manasija-viśikha-bhayāt iva bhāvanayā tvayi līnā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.10-1'>āvāsaḥ vipināyate priya-sakhī-mālā api jālāyate</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.10-2'>tāpaḥ api śvasitena dāva-dahana-jvālā-kalāpāyate /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.10-3'>sā api tvat-viraheṇa hanta hariṇīrūpāyate hā katham</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.10-4'>kandarpaḥ api yamāyate viracayan śārdūla-vikrīḍitam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.11-1'>stana-vinihitam api hāram udāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.11-2'>sā manute kṛśa-tanuḥ atibhāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.11-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.12-1'>sarasa-masṛṇam api malayaja-paṅkam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.12-2'>paśyati viṣam iva vapuṣi saśaṅkam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.12-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.13-1'>śvasita-pavanam anupama-pariṇāham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.13-2'>madana-dahanam iva vahati sadāham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.13-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.14-1'>diśi diśi kirati sajala-kaṇa-jālam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.14-2'>nayana-nalinam iva vigalita-nālam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.14-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.15-1'>nayana-viṣayam api kisalaya-talpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.15-2'>kalayati vihita-hutāśa-vikalpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.15-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.16-1'>tyajati na pāṇi-talena kapolam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.16-2'>bāla-śaśinam iva sāyam alolam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.16-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.17-1'>hariḥ iti hariḥ iti japati sakāmam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.17-2'>viraha-vihita-maraṇā iva nikāmam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.17-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.18-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam iti gītam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.18-2'>sukhayatu keśava-padam upanītam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.18-3'>rādhikā virahe tava keśava //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.19-1'>sā romāñcati sītkaroti vilapati utkampate tāmyati</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.19-2'>dhyāyati udbhramati pramīlati patati udyāti mūrcchati api /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.19-3'>etāvati atanu-jvare vara-tanuḥ jīvet na kim te rasāt</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.19-4'>svaḥ-vaidya-pratima prasīdasi yadi tyaktaḥ anyathā na antakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.20'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.20-1'>smara-āturām daivata-vaidya-hṛdya tvat-aṅga-saṅga-amṛta-mātra-sādhyām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.20-2'>vimukta-bādhām kuruṣe na rādhām upendra vajrāt api dāruṇaḥ asi //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.21'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.21-1'>kandarpa-jvara-saṃjvara-ātura-tanoḥ āścaryam asyāḥ ciram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.21-2'>cetaḥ candana-candramaḥ-kamalinī-cintāsu saṃtāmyati /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.21-3'>kiṃtu klānti-vaśena śītala-tanum tvām ekam eva priyam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.21-4'>dhyāyantī rahasi sthitā katham api kṣīṇā kṣaṇam prāṇiti //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_4.22'>
<l xml:id='GG_4.22-1'>kṣaṇam api virahaḥ purā na sehe</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.22-2'>nayana-nimīlana-khinnayā yayā te /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.22-3'>śvasiti katham asau rasāla-śākhām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_4.22-4'>cira-viraheṇa vilokya puṣpita-agrām //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_5.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.1-1'>aham iha nivasāmi yāhi rādhām anunaya mat-vacanena ca ānayethāḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.1-2'>iti madhuripuṇā sakhī niyuktā svayam idam etya punaḥ jagāda rādhām //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.2-1'>vahati malaya-samīre madanam upanidhāya /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.2-2'>sphuṭati kusuma-nikare virahi-hṛdaya-dalanāya //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.2-3'>tava virahe vanamālī sakhi sīdati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.3-1'>dahati śiśira-mayūkhe maraṇam anukaroti /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.3-2'>patati madana-viśikhe vilapati vikalataraḥ ati //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.3-3'>tava virahe vanamālī sakhi sīdati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.4-1'>dhvanati madhupa-samūhe śravaṇam apidadhāti /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.4-2'>manasi valita-virahe niśi niśi rujam upayāti //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.4-3'>tava virahe vanamālī sakhi sīdati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.5-1'>vasati vipina-vitāne tyajati lalita-dhāma /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.5-2'>luṭhati dharaṇi-śayane bahu vilapati tava nāma //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.5-3'>tava virahe vanamālī sakhi sīdati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.6-1'>bhaṇati kavi-jayadeve virahi-vilasitena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.6-2'>manasi rabhasa-vibhave hariḥ udayatu sukṛtena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.6-3'>tava virahe vanamālī sakhi sīdati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.7-1'>pūrvam yatra samam tvayā ratipateḥ āsāditāḥ siddhayaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.7-2'>tasmin eva nikuñja-manmatha-mahā-tīrthe punaḥ mādhavaḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.7-3'>dhyāyan tvām aniśam japan api tava eva ālāpa-mantra-āvalīm</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.7-4'>bhūyaḥ tvat-kuca-kumbha-nirbhara-parīrambha-amṛtam vāñchati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.8-1'>rati-sukha-sāre gatam abhisāre madana-manohara-veśam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.8-2'>na kuru nitambini gamana-vilambanam anusara tam hṛdaya-īśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.8-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.9-1'>nāma-sametam kṛta-saṅketam vādayate mṛdu-veṇum /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.9-2'>bahu manute nanu te tanu-saṃgata-pavana-calitam api reṇum //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.9-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.10-1'>patati patatre vicalati patre śaṅkita-bhavat-upayānam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.10-2'>racayati śayanam sacakita-nayanam paśyati tava panthānam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.10-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.11-1'>mukharam adhīram tyaja mañjīram ripum iva keli-sulolam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.11-2'>cala sakhi kuñjam satimira-puñjam śīlaya nīla-nicolam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.11-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.12-1'>urasi murāreḥ upahita-hāre ghane iva tarala-balāke /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.12-2'>taḍit iva pīte rati-viparīte rājasi sukṛta-vipāke //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.12-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.13-1'>vigalita-vasanam parihṛta-rasanam ghaṭaya jaghanam apidhānam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.13-2'>kisalaya-śayane paṅkaja-nayane nidhim iva harṣa-nidānam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.13-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.14-1'>hariḥ abhimānī rajaniḥ idānīm iyam api yāti virāmam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.14-2'>kuru mama vacanam satvara-racanam pūraya madhuripu-kāmam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.14-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.15-1'>śrījayadeve kṛta-hari-seve bhaṇati parama-ramaṇīyam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.15-2'>pramudita-hṛdayam harim atisadayam namata sukṛta-kamanīyam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.15-3'>dhīra-samīre yamunā-tīre vasati vane vanamālī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.16-1'>vikirati muhuḥ śvāsān āśāḥ puraḥ muhuḥ īkṣate</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.16-2'>praviśati muhuḥ kuñjam guñjan muhuḥ bahu tāmyati /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.16-3'>racayati muhuḥ śayyām paryākulam muhuḥ īkṣate</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.16-4'>madana-kadana-klāntaḥ kānte priyaḥ tava vartate //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.17-1'>tvat-vāmyena samam samagram adhunā tigmāṃśuḥ astam gataḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.17-2'>govindasya manorathena ca samam prāptam tamaḥ sāndratām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.17-3'>kokānām karuṇa-svanena sadṛśī dīrghā mat-abhyarthanā</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.17-4'>tat mugdhe viphalam vialambanam asau ramyaḥ abhisāra-kṣaṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.18-1'>āśleṣāt anu cumbanāt anu nakha-ullekhāt anu svāntaja-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.18-2'>prodbodhāt anu saṃbhramāt anu rata-ārambhāt anu prītayoḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.18-3'>anya-artham gatayoḥ bhramāt militayoḥ saṃbhāṣaṇaiḥ jānatoḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.18-4'>dampatyoḥ iha kaḥ na kaḥ na tamasi vrīḍā-vimiśraḥ rasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_5.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_5.19-1'>sabhaya-cakitam vinyasyantīm dṛśam timire pathi</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.19-2'>pratitaru muhuḥ sthitvā mandam padāni vitanvatīm /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.19-3'>katham api rahaḥ prāptām aṅgaiḥ anaṅga-taraṅgibhiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_5.19-4'>sumukhi subhagaḥ paśyan saḥ tvām upaitu kṛta-arthatām //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_6.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.1-1'>atha tām gantum aśaktām ciram anuraktām latā-gṛhe dṛṣṭvā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.1-2'>tat-caritam govinde manasija-mande sakhī prāha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.2-1'>paśyati diśi diśi rahasi bhavantam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.2-2'>tat-adhara-madhura-madhūni pibantam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.2-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.3-1'>tvat-abhisaraṇa-rabhasena valantī /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.3-2'>patati padāni kiyanti calantī //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.3-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.4-1'>vihita-viśada-bisa-kisalaya-valayā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.4-2'>jīvati param iha tava rati-kalayā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.4-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.5-1'>muhuḥ avalokita-maṇḍana-līlā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.5-2'>madhuripuḥ aham iti bhāvana-śīlā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.5-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.6-1'>tvaritam upaiti na katham abhisāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.6-2'>hariḥ iti vadati sakhīm anuvāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.6-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.7-1'>śliṣyati cumbati jaladhara-kalpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.7-2'>hariḥ upagataḥ iti timiram analpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.7-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.8-1'>bhavati vilambini vigalita-lajjā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.8-2'>vilapati roditi vāsaka-sajjā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.8-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.9-1'>śrījayadeva-kaveḥ idam uditam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.9-2'>rasika-janam tanutām atimuditam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.9-3'>nātha hare sīdati rādhā vāsa-gṛhe //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.10-1'>vipula-pulaka-pāliḥ sphīta-sītkāram antar-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.10-2'>janita-jaḍima-kāku-vyākulam vyāharantī /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.10-3'>tava kitava vidhāya amanda-kandarpa-cintām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.10-4'>rasa-jaladhi-nimagnā dhyāna-lagnā mṛgākṣī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_6.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_6.11-1'>aṅgeṣu ābharaṇam karoti bahuśaḥ patre api saṃcāriṇi</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.11-2'>prāptam tvām pariśaṅkate vitanute śayyām ciram dhyāyati /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.11-3'>iti ākalpa-vikalpa-talpa-racanā-saṃkalpa-līlā-śata-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_6.11-4'>vyāsaktā api vinā tvayā vara-tanuḥ naiṣā niśām neṣyati //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_7.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.1-1'>atra antare ca kulaṭā-kula-vartma-pāta-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.1-2'>saṃjāta-pātakaḥ iva sphuṭa-lāñchana-śrīḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.1-3'>vṛndāvana-antaram adīpayat aṃśu-jālaiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.1-4'>diksundarī-vadana-candana-binduḥ induḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.2-1'>prasarati śaśa-dhara-bimbe vihita-vilambe ca mādhave vidhurā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.2-2'>viracita-vividha-vilāpam sā paritāpam cakāra uccaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.3-1'>kathita-samaye api hariḥ ahaha na yayau vanam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.3-2'>mama viphalam idam amala-rūpam api yauvanam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.3-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.4-1'>yat anugamanāya niśi gahanam api śīlitam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.4-2'>tena mama hṛdayam idam asamaśara-kīlitam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.4-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.5-1'>mama maraṇam eva varam ativitatha-ketanā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.5-2'>kim iha viṣahāmi viraha-analam acetanā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.5-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.6-1'>mām ahaha vidhurayati madhura-madhu-yāminī /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.6-2'>kāpi harim anubhavati kṛta-sukṛta-kāminī //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.6-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.7-1'>ahaha kalayāmi valaya-ādi-maṇi-bhūṣaṇam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.7-2'>hari-viraha-dahana-vahanena bahu-dūṣaṇam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.7-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.8-1'>kusuma-sukumāra-tanum atanu-śara-līlayā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.8-2'>srak api hṛdi hanti mām ativiṣama-śilayā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.8-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.9-1'>aham iha nivasāmi nagaṇita-vana-vetasā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.9-2'>smarati madhusūdanaḥ mām api na cetasā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.9-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.10-1'>hari-caraṇa-śaraṇa-jayadeva-kavi-bhāratī /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.10-2'>vasatu hṛdi yuvatiḥ iva komala-kalāvatī //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.10-3'>yāmi he kam iha śaraṇam sakhī-jana-vacana-vañcitā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.11-1'>tat kim kāmapi kāminīm abhisṛtaḥ kim vā kalā-kelibhiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.11-2'>baddhaḥ bandhubhiḥ andhakāriṇi vana-upānte kim u bhrāmyati /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.11-3'>kāntaḥ klānta-manāḥ manāk api pathi prasthātum eva akṣamaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.11-4'>saṃketī-kṛta-mañju-vañjula-latā-kuñje api yat na āgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.12-1'>atha āgatām mādhavam antareṇa sakhīm iyam vīkṣya viṣāda-mūkām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.12-2'>viśaṅkamānā ramitam kayāpi janārdanam dṛṣṭavat etat āha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.13-1'>smara-samara-ucita-viracita-veśā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.13-2'>galita-kusuma-dara-vilulita-keśā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.13-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.14-1'>hari-parirambhaṇa-valita-vikārā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.14-2'>kuca-kalaśa-upari taralita-hārā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.14-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.15-1'>vicalat-alaka-lalita-ānana-candrā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.15-2'>tat-adhara-pāna-rabhasa-kṛta-tandrā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.15-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.16-1'>cañcala-kuṇḍala-dalita-kapolā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.16-2'>mukharita-rasana-jaghana-gati-lolā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.16-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.17-1'>dayita-vilokita-lajjita-hasitā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.17-2'>bahu-vidha-kūjita-rati-rasa-rasitā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.17-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.18-1'>vipula-pulaka-pṛthu-vepathu-bhaṅgā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.18-2'>śvasita-nimīlita-vikasat-anaṅgā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.18-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.19-1'>śramajala-kaṇa-bhara-subhaga-śarīrā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.19-2'>paripatitā urasi rati-raṇa-dhīrā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.19-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.20'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.20-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇita-hari-ramitam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.20-2'>kali-kaluṣam janayatu pariśamitam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.20-3'>kāpi madhuripuṇā vilasati yuvatiḥ adhika-guṇā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.21'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.21-1'>viraha-pāṇḍu-murāri-mukha-ambuja-dyutiḥ iyam tirayan api cetanām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.21-2'>vidhuḥ atīva tanoti manobhuvaḥ sahṛdaye hṛdaye madana-vyathām //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.22'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.22-1'>samudita-madane ramaṇī-vadane cumbana-valita-adhare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.22-2'>mṛgamada-tilakam likhati sapulakam mṛgam iva rajanī-kare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.22-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.23'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.23-1'>ghana-caya-rucire racayati cikure taralita-taruṇa-ānane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.23-2'>kurabaka-kusumam capalā-suṣamam rati-pati-mṛga-kānane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.23-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.24'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.24-1'>ghaṭayati sughane kuca-yuga-gagane mṛgamada-ruci-rūṣite /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.24-2'>maṇi-saram amalam tāraka-paṭalam nakha-pada-śaśi-bhūṣite //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.24-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.25'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.25-1'>jita-bisa-śakale mṛdu-bhuja-yugale kara-tala-nalinī-dale /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.25-2'>marakata-valayam madhu-kara-nicayam vitarati hima-śītale //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.25-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.26'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.26-1'>rati-gṛha-jaghane vipula-apaghane manasija-kanaka-āsane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.26-2'>maṇi-maya-rasanam toraṇa-hasanam vikirati kṛta-vāsane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.26-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.27'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.27-1'>caraṇa-kisalaye kamalā-nilaye nakha-maṇi-gaṇa-pūjite /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.27-2'>bahiḥ-apavaraṇam yāvaka-bharaṇam janayati hṛdi yojite //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.27-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.28'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.28-1'>ramayati sudṛśam kāmapi subhṛśam khala-haladhara-sodare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.28-2'>kim aphalam avasam ciram iha virasam vada sakhi viṭapa-udare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.28-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.29'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.29-1'>iha rasa-bhaṇane kṛta-hari-guṇane madhuripu-pada-sevake /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.29-2'>kaliyuga-caritam na vasatu duritam kavi-nṛpa-jayadevake //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.29-3'>ramate yamunā-pulina-vane vijayī murāriḥ adhunā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.30'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.30-1'>na āyātaḥ sakhi nirdayaḥ yadi śaṭhaḥ tvam dūti kim dūyase</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.30-2'>svacchandam bahu-vallabhaḥ saḥ ramate kim tatra te dūṣaṇam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.30-3'>paśya adya priya-saṃgamāya dayitasya ākṛṣyamāṇam guṇaiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.30-4'>utkaṇṭha-ārti-bharāt iva sphuṭat idam cetaḥ svayam yāsyāmi //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.31'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.31-1'>anila-tarala-kuvalaya-nayanena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.31-2'>tapati na sā kisalaya-śayanena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.31-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.32'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.32-1'>vikasita-sarasija-lalita-mukhena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.32-2'>sphuṭati na sā manasija-viśikhena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.32-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.33'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.33-1'>amṛta-madhura-mṛdutara-vacanena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.33-2'>jvalati na sā malayaja-pavanena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.33-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.34'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.34-1'>sthala-jala-ruha-rucikara-caraṇena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.34-2'>luṭhati na sā himakara-kiraṇena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.34-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.35'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.35-1'>sajala-jalada-samudaya-rucireṇa /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.35-2'>dalati na sā hṛdi cira-viraheṇa //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.35-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.36'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.36-1'>kanaka-nikaṣa-ruci-śuci-vasanena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.36-2'>śvasiti na sā parijana-hasanena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.36-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.37'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.37-1'>sakala-bhuvana-jana-vara-taruṇena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.37-2'>vahati na sā rujam atikaruṇena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.37-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.38'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.38-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇita-vacanena /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.38-2'>praviśatu hariḥ api hṛdayam anena //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.38-3'>sakhi yā ramitā vanamālinā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.39'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.39-1'>manobhava-ānandana candana-anila</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.39-2'>prasīda re dakṣiṇa muñca vāmatām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.39-3'>kṣaṇam jagat-prāṇa vidhāya mādhavam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.39-4'>puraḥ mama prāṇa-haraḥ bhaviṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.40'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.40-1'>ripuḥ iva sakhī-saṃvāsaḥ ayam śikhī iva hima-anilaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.40-2'>viṣam iva sudhā-raśmiḥ yasmin dunoti manaḥ-gate /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.40-3'>hṛdayam adaye tasmin evam punaḥ valate balāt</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.40-4'>kuvalaya-dṛśām vāmaḥ kāmaḥ nikāma-niraṅkuśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_7.41'>
<l xml:id='GG_7.41-1'>bādhām vidhehi malaya-anila pañcabāṇa</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.41-2'>prāṇān gṛhāṇa na gṛham punaḥ āśrayiṣye /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.41-3'>kim te kṛta-anta-bhagini kṣamayā taraṅgaiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_7.41-4'>aṅgāni siñca mama śāmyatu deha-dāhaḥ //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_8.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.1-1'>atha katham api yāminīm vinīya smara-śara-jarjaritā api sā prabhāte /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.1-2'>anunaya-vacanam vadantam agre praṇatam api priyam āha sābhyasūyam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.2-1'>rajani-janita-guru-jāgara-rāga-kaṣāyitam alasa-niveśam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.2-2'>vahati nayanam anurāgam iva sphuṭam udita-rasa-abhiniveśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.2-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.2-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.3-1'>kajjala-malina-vilocana-cumbana-viracita-nīlima-rūpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.3-2'>daśana-vasanam aruṇam tava kṛṣṇa tanoti tanoḥ anurūpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.3-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.3-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.4-1'>vapuḥ anuharati tava smara-saṅgara-khara-nakhara-kṣata-rekham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.4-2'>marakata-śakala-kalita-kaladhauta-lipeḥ iva rati-jaya-lekham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.4-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.4-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.5-1'>caraṇa-kamala-galat-alaktaka-siktam idam tava hṛdayam udāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.5-2'>darśayati iva bahiḥ madana-druma-nava-kisalaya-parivāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.5-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.5-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.6-1'>daśana-padam bhavat-adhara-gatam mama janayati cetasi khedam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.6-2'>kathayati katham adhunā api mayā saha tava vapuḥ etat abhedam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.6-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.6-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.7-1'>bahiḥ iva malinataram tava kṛṣṇa manaḥ api bhaviṣyati nūnam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.7-2'>katham atha vañcayase janam anugatam asamaśara-jvara-dūnam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.7-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.7-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.8-1'>bhramati bhavān abalā-kavalāya vaneṣu kim atra vicitram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.8-2'>prathayati pūtanikā eva vadhū-vadha-nirdaya-bāla-caritram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.8-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.8-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.9-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇita-rati-vañcita-khaṇḍita-yuvati-vilāpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.9-2'>śṛṇuta sudhā-madhuram vibudhāḥ vibudha-ālayataḥ api durāpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.9-3'>harihari yāhi mādhava yāhi keśava mā vada kaitava-vādam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.9-4'>tām anusara sarasīruha-locana yā tava harati viṣādam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_8.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_8.10-1'>tava idam paśyantyāḥ prasarat anurāgam bahiḥ iva</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.10-2'>priyā-pāda-alakta-churitam aruṇa-chāya-hṛdayam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.10-3'>mama adya prakhyāta-praṇaya-bhara-bhaṅgena kitava</l>
<l xml:id='GG_8.10-4'>tvat-ālokaḥ śokāt api kim api lajjām janayati //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_9.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.1-1'>tām atha manmatha-khinnām rati-rasa-bhinnām viṣāda-sampannām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.1-2'>anucintita-hari-caritām kalaha-antar-itām uvāca sakhī //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.2-1'>hariḥ abhisarati vahati madhu-pavane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.2-2'>kim aparam adhika-sukham sakhi bhavane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.2-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.3-1'>tāla-phalāt api gurum atisarasam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.3-2'>kim viphalīkuruṣe kuca-kalaśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.3-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.4-1'>kati na kathitam idam anupadam aciram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.4-2'>mā parihara harim atiśaya-ruciram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.4-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.5-1'>kim iti viṣīdasi rodiṣi vikalā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.5-2'>vihasati yuvati-sabhā tava sakalā //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.5-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.6-1'>sajala-nalinī-dala-śītala-śayane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.6-2'>harim avalokaya saphalaya nayane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.6-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.7-1'>janayasi manasi kim iti guru-khedam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.7-2'>śṛṇu mama vacanam anīhita-bhedam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.7-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.8-1'>hariḥ upayātu vadatu bahu-madhuram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.8-2'>kim iti karoṣi hṛdayam atividhuram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.8-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.9-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam atilalitam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.9-2'>sukhayatu rasika-janam hari-caritam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.9-3'>mādhave mā kuru mānini mānam aye //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_9.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_9.10-1'>snigdhe yat paruṣā asi yat praṇamati stabdhā asi yat rāgiṇi</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.10-2'>dveṣa-sthā asi yat unmukhe vimukhatām yātā asi tasmin priye /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.10-3'>yuktam tat viparīta-kāriṇi tava śrīkhaṇḍa-carcā viṣam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_9.10-4'>śītāṃśuḥ tapanaḥ himam hutavahaḥ krīḍā-mudaḥ yātanāḥ //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_10.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.1-1'>atra antare masṛṇa-roṣa-vaśām asīma-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.1-2'>niḥśvāsa-niḥsaha-mukhīm sumukhīm upetya /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.1-3'>savrīḍam īkṣita-sakhī-vadanām dinānte</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.1-4'>sānanda-gadgada-padam hariḥ iti uvāca //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-1'>vadasi yadi kiṃcit api danta-ruci-kaumudī</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-2'>harati dara-timiram atighoram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-3'>sphurat-adhara-sīdhave tava vadana-candramāḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-4'>rocayatu locana-cakoram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.2-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-1'>satyam eva asi yadi sudati mayi kopinī</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-2'>dehi khara-nakhara-śara-ghātam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-3'>ghaṭaya bhuja-bandhanam janaya rada-khaṇḍanam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-4'>yena vā bhavati sukha-jātam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.3-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-1'>tvam asi mama bhūṣaṇam tvam asi mama jīvanam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-2'>tvam asi mama bhava-jaladhi-ratnam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-3'>bhavatu bhavatī iha mayi satatam anurodhinī</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-4'>tatra mama hṛdayam atiyatnam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.4-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-1'>nīla-nalina-ābham api tanvi tava locanam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-2'>dhārayati koka-nada-rūpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-3'>kusumaśara-bāṇa-bhāvena yadi rañjayasi</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-4'>kṛṣṇam idam etat anurūpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.5-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-1'>sphuratu kuca-kumbhayoḥ upari maṇi-mañjarī</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-2'>rañjayatu tava hṛdaya-deśam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-3'>rasatu raśanā api tava ghana-jaghana-maṇḍale</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-4'>ghoṣayatu manmatha-nideśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.6-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-1'>sthala-kamala-gañjanam mama hṛdaya-rañjanam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-2'>janita-rati-raṅga-parabhāgam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-3'>bhaṇa masṛṇa-vāṇi karavāṇi pada-paṅkajam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-4'>sarasa-lasat-alaktaka-rāgam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.7-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-1'>smara-garala-khaṇḍanam mama śirasi maṇḍanam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-2'>dehi pada-pallavam udāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-3'>jvalati mayi dāruṇaḥ madana-kadana-aruṇaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-4'>haratu tat-upāhita-vikāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.8-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-1'>iti caṭula-cāṭu-paṭu-cāru muravairiṇaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-2'>rādhikām adhi vacana-jātam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-3'>jayati padmāvatī-ramaṇa-jayadeva-kavi-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-4'>bhāratī-bhaṇitam atiśātam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-5'>priye cāru-śīle muñca mayi mānam anidānam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-6'>sapadi madana-analaḥ dahati mama mānasam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.9-7'>dehi mukha-kamala-madhu-pānam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.10-1'>parihara kṛta-ātaṅke śaṅkām tvayā satatam ghana-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.10-2'>stana-jaghanayā ākrānte svānte para-anavakāśini /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.10-3'>viśati vitanoḥ anyaḥ dhanyaḥ na kaḥ api mama-antaram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.10-4'>stana-bhara-parīrambha-ārambhe vidhehi vidheyatām //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.11-1'>mugdhe vidhehi mayi nirdaya-danta-daṃśa-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.11-2'>doḥ-valli-bandha-nibiḍa-stana-pīḍanāni /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.11-3'>caṇḍi tvam eva mudam añca na pañcabāṇa-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.11-4'>caṇḍāla-kāṇḍa-dalanāt asavaḥ prayāntu //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.12-1'>vyathayati vṛthā maunam tanvi prapañcaya pañcamam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.12-2'>taruṇi madhura-ālāpaiḥ tāpam vinodaya dṛṣṭibhiḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.12-3'>sumukhi vimukhī-bhāvam tāvat vimuñca na muñca mām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.12-4'>svayam atiśaya-snigdhaḥ mugdhe priyaḥ aham upasthitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.13-1'>bandhūka-dyuti-bāndhavaḥ ayam adharaḥ snigdhaḥ madhūka-chaviḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.13-2'>gaṇḍaḥ caṇḍi cakāsti nīla-nalina-śrī-mocanam locanam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.13-3'>nāsā abhyeti tila-prasūna-padavīm kunda-ābha-danti priye</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.13-4'>prāyaḥ tvat-mukha-sevayā vijayate viśvam saḥ puṣpāyudhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_10.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_10.14-1'>dṛśau tava mada-ālase vadanam indu-saṃdīpakam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.14-2'>gatiḥ jana-manoramā vidhuta-rambham ūru-dvayam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.14-3'>ratiḥ tava kalāvatī rucira-citra-lekhe bhruvau</l>
<l xml:id='GG_10.14-4'>aho vibudha-yauvatam vahasi tanvi pṛthvī-gatā //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_11.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.1-1'>suciram anunayena prīṇayitvā mṛga-akṣīm</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.1-2'>gatavati kṛta-veśe keśave kuñja-śayyām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.1-3'>racita-rucira-bhūṣām dṛṣṭi-moṣe pradoṣe</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.1-4'>sphurati niravasādām kāpi rādhām jagāda //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.2-1'>viracita-cāṭu-vacana-racanam caraṇe racita-praṇipātam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.2-2'>saṃprati mañjula-vañjula-sīmani keli-śayanam anuyātam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.2-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.3-1'>ghana-jaghana-stana-bhāra-bhare dara-manthara-caraṇa-vihāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.3-2'>mukharita-maṇi-mañjīram upaihi vidhehi marāla-vikāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.3-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.4-1'>śṛṇu ramaṇīyataram taruṇī-jana-mohana-madhupa-virāvam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.4-2'>kusumaśarāsana-śāsana-bandini pika-nikare bhaja bhāvam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.4-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.5-1'>anila-tarala-kisalaya-nikareṇa kareṇa latā-nikurambam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.5-2'>preraṇam iva karabha-ūru karoti gatim pratimuñca vilambam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.5-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.6-1'>sphuritam anaṅga-taraṅga-vaśāt iva sūcita-hari-parirambham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.6-2'>pṛccha manohara-hāra-vimala-jala-dhāram amum kuca-kumbham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.6-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.7-1'>adhigatam akhila-sakhībhiḥ idam tava vapuḥ api rati-raṇa-sajjam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.7-2'>caṇḍi rasita-raśanā-rava-ḍiṇḍimam abhisara sarasam alajjam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.7-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.8-1'>smara-śara-subhaga-nakhena kareṇa sakhīm avalambya salīlam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.8-2'>cala valaya-kvaṇitaiḥ avabodhaya harim api nijagati-śīlam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.8-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.9-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam adharīkṛta-hāram udāsita-vāmam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.9-2'>hari-vinihita-manasām adhitiṣṭhatu kaṇṭha-taṭīm avirāmam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.9-3'>mugdhe madhumathanam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.10-1'>sā mām drakṣyati vakṣyati smara-kathām prati-aṅgam āliṅganaiḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.10-2'>prītim yāsyati raṃsyate sakhi samāgatya iti cintā-ākulaḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.10-3'>saḥ tvām paśyati vepate pulakayati ānandati svidyati</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.10-4'>pratyudgacchati mūrcchati sthira-tamaḥ-puñje nikuñje priyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.11-1'>akṣṇoḥ nikṣipat-añjanam śravaṇayoḥ tāpiccha-guccha-āvalīm</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.11-2'>mūrdhni śyāma-saroja-dāma kucayoḥ kastūrikā-patrakam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.11-3'>dhūrtānām abhisāra-satvara-hṛdām viṣvak-nikuñje sakhi</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.11-4'>dhvāntam nīla-nicola-cāru sudṛśām prati-aṅgam āliṅgati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.12-1'>kāśmīra-gaura-vapuṣām abhisārikāṇām</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.12-2'>ābaddha-rekham abhitaḥ ruci-mañjarībhiḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.12-3'>etat tamāla-dala-nīla-tamam tamisram</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.12-4'>tat-prema-hema-nikaṣa-upalatām tanoti //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.13-1'>hāra-āvalī-tarala-kāñci-dāma-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.13-2'>keyūra-kaṅkaṇa-maṇi-dyuti-dīpitasya /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.13-3'>dvāre nikuñja-nilayasya harim nirīkṣya</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.13-4'>vrīḍāvatīm atha sakhī nijagāda rādhām //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.14-1'>mañjutara-kuñja-tala-keli-sadane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.14-2'>vilasa rati-rabhasa-hasita-vadane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.14-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.15-1'>nava-bhavat-aśoka-dala-śayana-sāre /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.15-2'>vilasa kuca-kalaśa-tarala-hāre //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.15-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.16-1'>kusuma-caya-racita-śuci-vāsa-gehe /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.16-2'>vilasa kusuma-sukumāra-dehe //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.16-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.17-1'>cala-malaya-vana-pavana-surabhi-śīte /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.17-2'>vilasa rasa-valita-lalita-gīte //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.17-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.18-1'>madhu-mudita-madhupa-kula-kalita-rāve /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.18-2'>vilasa madana-rasa-sarasa-bhāve //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.18-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.19-1'>madhuratara-pika-nikara-ninada-mukhare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.19-2'>vilasa daśana-ruci-rucira-śikhare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.19-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.20'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.20-1'>vitata-bahu-valli-nava-pallava-ghane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.20-2'>vilasa ciram alasa-pīna-jaghane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.20-3'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.21'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.21-1'>vihita-padmāvatī-sukha-samāje /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.21-2'>kuru murāre maṅgala-śatāni</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.21-3'>bhaṇati jayadeva-kavi-rāje //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.21-4'>praviśa rādhe mādhava-samīpam iha //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.22'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.22-1'>tvām cittena ciram vahan ayam atiśrāntaḥ bhṛśam tāpitaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.22-2'>kandarpeṇa tu pātum icchati sudhā-saṃbādha-bimba-adharam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.22-3'>asya aṅgam tat alaṃkuru kṣaṇam iha bhrū-kṣepa-lakṣmī-lava-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.22-4'>krīte dāse iva upasevita-pada-ambhoje kutaḥ sambhramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.23'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.23-1'>sā sasādhvasa-sānandam govinde lola-locanā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.23-2'>siñjāna-mañju-mañjīram praviveśa niveśanam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.24'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.24-1'>rādhā-vadana-vilokana-vikasita-vividha-vikāra-vibhaṅgam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.24-2'>jalanidhim iva vidhu-maṇḍala-darśana-taralita-tuṅga-taraṅgam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.24-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.24-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.25'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.25-1'>hāram amalatara-tāram urasi dadhatam parirabhya vidūram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.25-2'>sphuṭatara-phena-kadamba-karambitam iva yamunā-jala-pūram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.25-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.25-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.26'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.26-1'>śyāmala-mṛdula-kalevara-maṇḍalam adhigata-gaura-dukūlam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.26-2'>nīla-nalinam iva pīta-parāga-paṭala-bhara-valayita-mūlam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.26-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.26-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.27'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.27-1'>tarala-dṛk-añcala-calana-manohara-vadana-janita-rati-rāgam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.27-2'>sphuṭa-kamala-udara-khelita-khañjana-yugam iva śaradi taḍāgam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.27-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.27-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.28'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.28-1'>vadana-kamala-pariśīlana-milita-mihira-sama-kuṇḍala-śobham /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.28-2'>smita-ruci-rucira-samullasita-adhara-pallava-kṛta-rati-lobham //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.28-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.28-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.29'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.29-1'>śaśi-kiraṇa-churita-udara-jaladhara-sundara-sakusuma-kośam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.29-2'>timira-udita-vidhu-maṇḍala-nirmala-malayaja-tilaka-niveśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.29-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.29-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.30'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.30-1'>vipula-pulaka-bhara-danturitam rati-keli-kalābhiḥ adhīram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.30-2'>maṇi-gaṇa-kiraṇa-samūha-samujjvala-bhūṣaṇa-subhaga-śarīram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.30-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.30-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.31'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.31-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇita-vibhava-dviguṇīkṛta-bhūṣaṇa-bhāram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.31-2'>praṇamata hṛdi suciram vinidhāya harim sukṛta-udaya-sāram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.31-3'>harim eka-rasam ciram abhilaṣita-vilāsam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.31-4'>sā dadarśa guru-harṣa-vaśaṃvada-vadanam anaṅga-nivāsam //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.32'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.32-1'>atikramya apāṅgam śravaṇa-patha-paryanta-gamana-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.32-2'>prayāsena iva akṣṇoḥ taralatara-tāram patitayoḥ /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.32-3'>idānīm rādhāyāḥ priyatama-samāloka-samaye</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.32-4'>papāta sveda-ambu-prasara iva harṣa-aśru-nikaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_11.33'>
<l xml:id='GG_11.33-1'>bhajantyāḥ talpa-antam kṛta-kapaṭa-kaṇḍūti-pihita-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.33-2'>smitam yāte gehāt bahiḥ avahita-ālī-parijane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.33-3'>priya-āsyam paśyantyāḥ smara-śara-samākūta-subhagam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_11.33-4'>salajjā lajjā api vyagamat iva dūram mṛga-dṛśaḥ //</l>
</lg>

<lg xml:id='GG_12.1'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.1-1'>gatavati sakhī-vṛnde amanda-trapā-bhara-nirbhara-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.1-2'>smara-para-vaśa-ākūta-sphīta-smita-snapita-adharām /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.1-3'>sarasa-manasam dṛṣṭvā rādhām muhuḥ nava-pallava-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.1-4'>prasava-śayane nikṣipta-akṣīm uvāca hariḥ priyām //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.2'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.2-1'>kisalaya-śayana-tale kuru kāmini caraṇa-nalina-viniveśam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.2-2'>tava pada-pallava-vairi-parābhavam idam anubhavatu suveśam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.2-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.3'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.3-1'>kara-kamalena karomi caraṇamaham āgamitā asi vidūram /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.3-2'>kṣaṇam upakuru śayana-upari mām iva nūpuram anugata-śūram //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.3-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.4'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.4-1'>vadana-sudhā-nidhi-galitam amṛtamiva racaya vacanam anukūlam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.4-2'>viraham iva apanayāmi payodhara-rodhakam urasi dukūlam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.4-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.5'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.5-1'>priya-parirambhaṇa-rabhasa-valitam iva pulakitam atiduravāpam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.5-2'>mat-urasi kuca-kalaśam viniveśaya śoṣaya manasija-tāpam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.5-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.6'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.6-1'>adhara-sudhā-rasam upanaya bhāvini jīvaya mṛtam iva dāsam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.6-2'>tvayi vinihita-manasam viraha-anala-dagdha-vapuṣam avilāsam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.6-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.7'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.7-1'>śaśi-mukhi mukharaya maṇi-raśanā-guṇam anuguṇa-kaṇṭha-ninādam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.7-2'>śruti-yugale pika-ruta-vikale mama śamaya cirāt avasādam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.7-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.8'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.8-1'>mām ativiphala-ruṣā vikalīkṛtam avalokitum adhunā idam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.8-2'>mīlita-lajjitam iva nayanam tava virama visṛja rati-khedam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.8-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.9'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.9-1'>śrījayadeva-bhaṇitam idam anupada-nigadita-madhuripu-modam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.9-2'>janayatu rasika-janeṣu manorama-rati-sabhāva-vinodam //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.9-3'>kṣaṇam adhunā nārāyaṇam anugatam anusara rādhike //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.10'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.10-1'>māra-aṅke rati-keli-saṃkula-raṇa-ārambhe tayā sāhasa-</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.10-2'>prāyam kānta-jayāya kiṃcit upari prārambhi yat-sambhramāt /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.10-3'>niṣpandā jaghana-sthalī śithilā doḥ-valliḥ utkampitam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.10-4'>vakṣaḥ mīlitam akṣi pauruṣa-rasaḥ strīṇām kutaḥ sidhyati //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.11'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.11-1'>atha kāntam rati-klāntam api maṇḍana-vāñchayā /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.11-2'>nijagāda nirābādhā rādhā svādhīna-bhartṛkā //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.12'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.12-1'>kuru yadu-nandana candana-śiśiratareṇa kareṇa payodhare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.12-2'>mṛgamada-patrakam atra manobhava-maṅgala-kalaśa-sahodare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.12-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.13'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.13-1'>ali-kula-gañjanam añjanakam rati-nāyaka-sāyaka-mocane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.13-2'>tvat-adhara-cumbana-lambita-kajjalam ujjvalaya priya locane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.13-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.14'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.14-1'>nayana-kuraṅga-taraṅga-vikāsa-nirāsa-kare śruti-maṇḍale /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.14-2'>manaasija-pāśa-vilāsa-dhare śubha-veśa niveśaya kuṇḍale //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.14-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.15'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.15-1'>bhramara-cayam racayantam upari ruciram suciram mama saṃmukhe /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.15-2'>jita-kamale vimale parikarmaya narma-janakam alakam mukhe //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.15-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.16'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.16-1'>mṛgamada-rasa-valitam lalitam kuru tilakam alika-rajanīkare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.16-2'>vihita-kalaṅka-kalam kamala-ānana viśramita-śrama-śīkare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.16-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.17'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.17-1'>mama rucire cikure kuru mānada mānasaja-dhvaja-cāmare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.17-2'>rati-galite lalite kusumāni śikhaṇḍi-śikhaṇḍaka-ḍāmare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.17-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.18'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.18-1'>sarasa-ghane jaghane mama śambara-dāraṇa-vāraṇa-kandare /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.18-2'>maṇi-raśanā-vasana-ābharaṇāni śubha-āśaya vāsaya sundare //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.18-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.19'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.19-1'>śrījayadeva-vacasi rucire hṛdayam sadayam kuru maṇḍane /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.19-2'>hari-caraṇa-smaraṇa-amṛta-kṛta-kali-kaluṣa-bhava-jvara-khaṇḍane //</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.19-3'>nijagāda sā yadu-nandane krīḍati hṛdaya-ānandane //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.20'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.20-1'>racaya kucayoḥ patram citram kuruṣva kapolayoḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.20-2'>ghaṭaya jaghane kāñcīm añca srajā kabarī-bharam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.20-3'>kalaya valaya-śreṇīm pāṇau pade kuru nūpurau</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.20-4'>iti nigaditaḥ prītaḥ pītāmbaraḥ api tathā akarot //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.21'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.21-1'>yat gāndharva-kalāsu kauśalam anudhyānam ca yat vaiṣṇavam</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.21-2'>yat śṛṅgāra-viveka-tattvam api yat kāvyeṣu līlāyitam /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.21-3'>tat sarvam jayadeva-paṇḍita-kaveḥ kṛṣṇa-eka-tāna-ātmanaḥ</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.21-4'>sānandāḥ pariśodhayantu sudhiyaḥ śrīgītagovindataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<lg xml:id='GG_12.22'>
<l xml:id='GG_12.22-1'>śrībhojadeva-prabhavasya rāmādevī-suta-śrījayadevakasya /</l>
<l xml:id='GG_12.22-2'>parāśara-ādi-priya-varga-kaṇṭhe śrīgītagovinda-kavitvam astu //</l>
</lg>

  </body>
